about_the_game:
The Super Cane Magic ZERO original soundtrack features more than 60 minutes of music created exclusively for the game.

MP3-format files will be placed in your Super Cane Magic ZERO folder in the Steam Directory:
...Steam\steamapps\common\Super Cane Magic ZERO\Soundtrack

TRACKLIST

  • 01. Super Cane Magic ZERO Theme
  • 02. Super Cane Magic ZERO - Menu Theme
  • 03. Super Cane Magic ZERO - Instrumental Theme
  • 04. Super Cane Metal ZERO
  • 05. Arena Battle Theme
  • 06. Challenge!
  • 07. Super Cane Magic ZERO - Minimal Theme
  • 08. Character Selection Theme
  • 09. Happy Funky Challenge
  • 10. Jail Song
  • 11. Sad Poptarts Theme
  • 12. Poptarts Theme
  • 13. Museum Chillout
  • 14. Minestronya
  • 15. Boss Music
  • 16. The Ritual
  • 17. Volcano Rumble
  • 18. Malvagius Theme
  • 19. Cutscene Song
  • 20. Laser Mountain Theme
  • 21. Monastery Theme
  • 22. Dreamworld Theme
  • 23. Underwater Theme
  • 24. Moon Dance Explosion
  • 25. Mecha Battle
  • 26. Delicious Credit Rolls
